context: Nothing to see here folks. Same old - same old. Move along please.
Nothing new..this has been going on for years as far back as when Clark pulled out a gun on the security guard at Walley World.
Used to go there in the 60's for Community Picnic.   Now I wouldn't step foot.   A small group has ruined everything in this country.  Even the simple pleasures are unsafe.
All of these crime issues in PA courtesy of guys like Fetterman.
An amusement park becomes a prison camp.
